summary: A group of mountaineers in the Scottish Highlands discover a kidnapped girl and are pursued by her captors.
cast: Alec Newman|Ed Speleers|Melissa George|Kate Magowan|Garry Sweeney|Holly Boyd|Douglas Russell|Alan Steele|Sean Harris|Stephen McCole|Karel Roden|Eamonn Walker|Paul Anderson|Eric Barlow|Jamie Edgell|Matthew Zajac|Gillian MacGregor|Dave Robertson|Tania Chant|Robert J. Goodwin|Alan Hughes
title: Un lugar solitario para morir
